Patients stratify accord performance status ( Karnofsky 70-80 % vs 90-100 % ) , degree measurability ( bidimensional v unidimensional ) , histologic subtype ( epithelial v others ) , WBC ( 8,300/mm3 high v less 8,300/mm3 ) , pain intensity ( low vs high ) , analgesic consumption ( low vs high ) , dyspnea ( low vs high ) , homocysteine ( low vs high ) , gender , country , treatment center .
